code: import React from"react";import{CurrentUserContext}from"../contexts/CurrentUserContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(props){var currentUser=React.useContext(CurrentUserContext);var isOwn=props.ownerId===currentUser._id;var isOwnLiked=props.likes.some(function(item){return item===currentUser._id;});var cardDeleteButtonClassName="card__trash ".concat(!isOwn?'card__trash_type_hidden':"");var cardLikeButtonClassName="card__btn-like ".concat(isOwnLiked?'card__btn-like_status_active':"");function handleClick(){props.onCardClick({link:props.link,name:props.name});}function handleLikeClick(){props.onCardLike(props);}function handleDeleteClick(){props.onCardDelete(props);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"card__photo",src:props.link,alt:props.name,onClick:handleClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card__info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"card__title",children:props.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card__likes",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:cardLikeButtonClassName,type:"button",onClick:handleLikeClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card__likes-counter",children:props.likes.length})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:cardDeleteButtonClassName,type:"button",onClick:handleDeleteClick})]});}export default Card;
